author: Mario Gimenez De Lorenzo

organization.description:
LAbRoio is a multidisciplinary research group at [University of L'Aquila](http://www.univaq.it/) with a thermo-physical laboratory focused on smart energy management models. Our aim is to give intelligence to a node called "prosumer"  (energy PROducer and conSUMER) by optimizing loads demands and energy supply. An example may be the cooling load of an air conditioner in daily/monthly operation during summer time, when the energy bill is dominated by it. Providing intelligence to the node translate to give forecasting capabilities to the heat control system based on ICT technology extendible to the entire electrical grid.

For information contact:

* Mario Gimenez De Lorenzo  **magidel** AT **gmail** DOT **com**
* Giovanni De Gasperis  **giovanni.degasperis** AT **univaq** DOT **it**

References

* F. Muzi, M. Gimenz De Lorenzo, G. De Gasperis - Intelligence Improvement of a "Prosumer" Node Through the Predictive Concept. IEEE-EMS 2012, UKSim-AMSS 6th European Modelling Symposium on Mathematical Modelling and Computer Simulation, Malta, 14–16 November 2012.

* Caianiello, P., S. Costantini, G. D. Gasperis, and M. Gimenez De Lorenzo, "Application of Hybrid Agents to Smart Energy Management of a Prosumer Node", International Jorunal of Interactive Multimedia and Artificial Intelligence, vol. 2, issue Regular Issue, no. 4, pp. 60-66, 12/2013
organization.title: LabRoio
organization.name: lab-roio

name: temperatures-solar-irradiance-hvac-performance-and-electrical-consumption
notes:
Dataset is a collection of misurements about Temperatures, Solar irradiance, HVAC performance and electrical consumption taken at thermo-phisical laboratory in Monteluco di Roio, L'Aquila, Italy. Its coordinates are:
* latitude 42 ° 20.273' N * longitude 13 ° 22:55' E * altitude 940 m The weather station, from which the climatic measures were taken, is located near the laboratory. Its coordinates are:
* latitude 42 ° 20,244' N * longitude 13 ° 22,611' E * altitude 960 m The data range is the interval between 07.26.2014, 01:30 h, 09.02.2014, 09:30 h.
The sampling time is 15 minutes
Description of data columns:
* **TimeS**: sample time transformed in seconds
* **Ta**: Ambient external temperature
* **Rs**: Solar irradiance
* **Power**: instantaneous electrical consumption
* **PowerAVG**: average electrical consumption during the last quarter hour (a)
* **Tin_nearAVG**: average internal temperature of the sensor near the air conditioner during the last quarter hour (b)
* **Tin_farAVG**: average internal temperature of the sensor away the air conditioner during the last quarter hour (b)
* **Tin_near**: instantaneous value of the internal temperature sensor near the air conditioner
* **Tin_far**: instantaneous value of the internal temperature sensor away from the air conditioner
* **SetPoint**: value of internal reference temperature of heat pump (c)


Notes (a) soon (b) soon (c) soon Collaborators * [Francesco Muzi](http://www.ing.univaq.it/personale/scheda_personale.php?codice=214) * [Giovanni De Gasperis](http://www.disim.univaq.it/main/home.php?users_username=giovanni.degasperis)
title: Temperatures, Solar irradiance, HVAC performance and electrical consumption
